roleset.name: within the skull/vertebrae, but outside the brain/spine
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Brain MRI revealed [single focal 9 x 9 mm enhancing lesion in the right central skull base adjacent to the medial temporal lobe and just above the Petrus apex]-1 and appears *-1 to be extra-axial
